description: The North American F-86F-35 Sabre is a single-engined, swept-wing, fighter-bomber, and tactical nuclear bomber. The F-86F-35 version is similar to the F-86F-25 version but can carry a nuclear bomb.
loadnotes: Either stations 1 to 4 or stations 5 to 12 can be used.
Stations 5 to 12 can each carry two RKs.
As an exception to the normal loading rules, a Mk 12 nuclear bomb (weight 1200 and load 3.0) can be carried on station 3.
